Room.Name: Myrr Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Myrr Lane, just east of the intersection with Kista Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: On the north side of the lane is a fence around an empty lot. On the south side you see another lot, but a huge multi-branched fungus covers it. The fungus seems to writh and move, but only slowly. There is a path through the tangled mass, but why would anyone want to walk through it?
